Reviews.Content: cannot understand negative reviews wife spent 2 nights hotel enjoyable stay chose hotel close proximity airport leaving early morning flight 24 hour complimentary shuttle bus service regular efficient although hotel well away centre madrid cause problems metro station alameda de fairly close approx 10 minutes walk get tourist spots around 1 euro breakfast buffet varied plentiful enjoyable maybe hotel need face lift may little shabby basin bathroom show signs wear looked could find bits threadbare carpet opinion really good hotel excellent location

Reviews.Content: hotel nice worth money looked like recently gone renovation room fresh new three bars downstairs enjoyable pool yet small peaceful would definitely suggest hotel looking spend night prior flight madrid shuttle service handy

Reviews.Content: chose stay tryp diana stayed tryp chain liked tryp proximity barajas airport tryp diana offers shuttle service airport shuttle every 15 minutes found incredibly convenient especially early hours morning hotel located approximately 1015 minutes airport way took cab seemed take lot longer arrive left shuttle next morning cab cost us 15 euros hotel street several hotels seemed fairly residential neighborhood spacious balcony room noticed nice peaceful park room large comfortable bed table chair desk computer tv also nice tour book madrid finding welcome name tv screen entered nice touch bathroom provided oversized plush bath towels 2 hand towels several amenities shoe wash dinner ate cafeteria downstairs small bar dining area menu pretty limited fine purposes 2 meals 2 drinks dessert cost us 25 euros lobby offers 4 computers internet service checking email also noticed another behind us past front desk breakfast dining area also saw different bar folks watching go hungry stay hotel morning decided check breakfast buffet open 6 17 euros steep us instead coffee bar wed dinner night first airport shuttle packed waited next one got quickly pleased efficiency comfort hotel allowed us get good nights sleep flight early next morning room cost us 140 total would spend much airport hotel room states tend cheaper felt like worth time

Reviews.Content: fair say pretty bad experience tryp diana interest fairness shall start positives wont take long great location airport yet noise planes overhead nice looking lobby efficient receptionist though 1am checked hardly room quite clean thats positives negatives hotel claims 4 star perhaps 30 years ago interiors first put standard certainly id say 2 star best despite told minibus would pick us airport took come twice past pickup area despite front didnt see us driver stop gave us standing wrong place thought bear mind midnight pretty much people anywhere near also didnt speak word english wasnt ideal hotel lobby renovated leads false sense security step ancient lifts start fear worse soon see corridors rooms start worry old dated overall true bad experience minibus overall stay even without awful standard decor rooms would still give rating location good simply couldnt recommend unless alternative sleeping outside rain even would close call

Reviews.Content: looking hotel stay night flight chose hotel reasonably priced listed 4 star although would never consider 4 star hotel american standards decent hotel one night flight bed right room general ok bathroom quite nice breakfast actually good pleasantly surprised array offerings looked like maybe much nicer soon

Reviews.Content: business trip stayed 2 days tryp diana overall quality poor stained broken plugs dirty bathroom horrible bed definitely negative staff wont give help making stay better suggest go hotel first time life also wrote official claim tourism think structure minus madrid tourist worst cases

Reviews.Content: sad tired looking place nothing wrong sense word nothing quite right either doesnt feel nice doesnt feel clean doesnt look inviting bathroom best bit quite modern probably refurbished recently shuttle bus service ok though pretty quick breakfast good way overpriced honestly way worth 17 euros
